website_summaries.verdict: Even though some minor issues have been noted,  this pair is affordable and comes in a pair to stretch 2 shoes at once.
pros: Available in several sizes for men's and women's shoes
cons: Not as durable as wooden competitors
Quality control issues: missing components and stretchers with irregularities

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve known about these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to try this on a couple of pairs of shoes before I wrote my review. I absolutely love these shoe stretchers! I have bunions and went to a podiatrist and the only thing he could recommend was either surgery or wear orthopedic inserts. He also prescribed lidocaine and Volteran for the pain. I wasn’t really happy with any of those options... So thought I’d try these shoe stretchers. They work amazing! Now I can wear my favorite shoes, and not have to worry about trying to buy inserts that don’t fit well, or make my feet hurt worse.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Morrison

customer_reviews.title: seems sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended, seems sturdy and well built. The extra plugs for your humpy feet lol are perfect for my bunion and biny feet. I do wish it had size markings omewhere. The 2 pair I've done were done overnight and worked well but the sizing was a rad too loose. If it had etched size meter on the screw portion and maybe standard narrow to wide range marks for with adjustments it would be more accurate. I'm going to measure my.foot an mark the screw shaft on he next pair and see if I get better accuracy with out the guess work. Overall good item and price.
customer_reviews.author: Maccjzs1516

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: It looks like my return window closed a month ago, so I am writing this in hopes that the seller sees it. My stretcher is just two months old and one already won't turn. Is there a replacement policy? If so, I will provide an updated review, but until then, I can only give it one star for durability reasons (and money wasted).
customer_reviews.author: SBSDC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the high reviews for this product. Cheap plastic especially the plugs. Only used about 4x on 2 pairs of shoes and a bunion plug already cracked. Sometimes the shoe widening part when stretched very wide gets stuck in open position and I have to manually push it together to close. Would return but it's past the 30 days return window, although I think Amazon might still accept the return. Would not buy again. 10/4/18 Update: now 3 bunion plugs have broken. Very cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: kbabe88

customer_reviews.title: Work great for stretching toe box.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I've tried several stretchers because I have a hard time finding business women's shoes with a wide enough toe box. This set has been very successful for low-heeled pumps (under 2"). My only complaint is that the stretcher bumps don't fit tightly into the provided holes and can fall out while trying to insert into the shoe. Taping them down solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: tvgaz

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew shoe stretchers even existed and was about to throw out several pairs of very expensive shoes. Somehow I stumbled on these and am so glad I decided to try them. They expand the width and length. Included are several add-ons to address problem areas so I was able to just stretch the back so I don't need to wear a band-aid on my heel. I feel like I got 3 new pairs of shoes because I can now wear my cute shoes without blisters or pain. The are easy to use and very durable. I wish I would have known abut them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rich

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: I used this shoe stretcher, Miserwe Shoe Stretcher with Carrying Bag Pair of Premium Two Way Shoe Stretcher (mfg. China) with FootMatters Professional Boot & Shoe Stretch Spray (USA mfg). I had a pair of shoes that 'fit' but were too snug for all-day wear. The shoes were casual sueded leather. I followed the directions for both products. In 24 hours the shoes fit comfortably. The length and width were both adjusted enough to make the fit a bit 'relaxed'. The appearance of the shoes was unaltered by the stretching. Use the spray in a well-ventilated area. While the order is not noxious, it can offend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Worthless and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Perplexed about all the positive reviews for this product. Several of the pieces were missing in the package, bolts loose in the product cheap plastic and fell apart immediately. Did I get a knock off item?
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I used this shoe stretcher in shoes he loves but never wears because it’s painful. He now has a whole new wardrobe of ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe stretcher is a game changer. My husband has gout flair ups in his feet. His feet are also very wide. Those two things have been keeping him in the same pair of sneakers for years. I used this shoe stretcher in shoes he loves but never wears because it’s painful. He now has a whole new wardrobe of shoes!! It works amazingly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley215

customer_reviews.title: Great item but screw undone
customer_reviews.text: Item is great but I'm super annoyed that one of them came with one of the screws out and I wouldn’t usually mind but the way the nut and bolt is inside the hole it’s actually really difficult for me to tighten it up so I have to figure out how to make that work. Maybe really super skinny pliers or something. Disappointing because now I can’t use it right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Silva

customer_reviews.title: Miserwe Shoe Stretcher with Carrying Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great, superb - got today and best I ever had. In fact ordered another pair. I have three more expensive ones that are wooden, but they are awkward. These fit better, especially if you wear a B width. I hope they last because they are plastic. I already saved one pair of shoes and expect to save more. I wish they made something like these for western boots, so I could extend the length. If anyone knows of such a product please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: rlm

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this purchase. I have multiple pairs of nice leather boots that just were too tight on the top of my feet. I tried wearing them around the house in pain with thick socks and blowing a hair dryer on them, trying to stretch them out. Nope. Thank you, Amazon! I received my shoe stretchers, popped them easily into my ladies 5.5 size Doc Marten boots, adjusted the stretcher- and boom- a day later, my boots fit perfectly. So wonderful! I’m now on a mission to adjust all of my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Great customer service reps!
customer_reviews.text: Used to stretch my size 9 rothy's points length and width-wise. Easy to use. Turn silver metal hook to open width-wise. Turn black knob to shorten and lengthen. I'm missing 2 bunion pads but the company said they're in the mail from China and should be here in a month. === UPDATE The company provided replacement bunion pads and they arrived in the mail today, right on time per their email communications. Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Christina C

customer_reviews.title: Great product to stretch shoes especially with bunions
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with bunions on my feet and I had purchased some shoe stretchers in the past that didn’t work. I recently purchased Miserwe shoe stretchers that came with a bag, extra buttons for bunions. I already used on 2 pairs of shoes and was satisfied with the results. I also go a bonus lucky scratch card which I won $6! I would recommend this product to anyone who is having some issues with their feet and shoes being too tight. Thank you, Evy
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had some brand new work shoes that I was dreading to break in. However, I got this stretcher and used it on them for 48 hours (24 more than recommended) and now the shoes fit like a comfy old pair they will replace. I was so surprised that i'm now looking at going shoe shopping just so I can custom fit them with this new gadget. Great job, well done. Update: After using the device two times, it has now broken and screws/washers fell out of it that wont go back. Very cheaply made, should have bought one of the wooden ones! Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyT

customer_reviews.title: Essential for any shoe closet.
customer_reviews.text: Just like many reviewers mentioned, I realized that I should have ordered these stretchers sooner. It would save me so much foot pain. I got it to stretch flats, that while my true size, gave me some nasty blisters. After stretching and tweaking a bit, no such problem anymore. Then I used these on all of my other 'offending' shoes. Some were too narrow, while others became small after my pregnancies, and I thought I need to get rid of them. Miraculously this simple device returned those shoes to my rotation. I even used it on booties, just folded the cuffs down. Wish there was something similar for boots.
customer_reviews.author: fashionista geek

customer_reviews.title: So far it's good but It still was a slight pain to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm still waiting for a success with this item but it's helped a tad bit since I've used it this week. I usually take my shoes to the cobbler nearby and I'm charged $10 for stretching. Since they overstretched my $400 pair of boots that I now need an insert for, I figured I'd give this shoe stretcher a shot. So far it's good but It still was a slight pain to get a pair of booties. Not as bad as it was when I first received the shoes. It's worth buying and I like the extra pieces that come for tight spaces in your shoes
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and easy to use. Not only help with stretching to the back, but also there's the option to stretch the toe area. I leave my Miserve shoe strtcher in for a week, maybe I could leave it for a day or two and that would do the trick but so far I am satisfied with the results. I stretched my flats, my sketchers, my stilettos, you name it. Can stretch as far as you can turn that knob and hook.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these stretchers
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had had these years ago. My first pair of shoe stretchers. I have a wide foot and it's always difficult to find wides in women's shoes at the store. I stretched a pair of Aerosole dress shoes that were too tight and they now fit so much better. They're not perfect, but they're close. My husband also has a wide foot. 1 foot is wider than the other in a certain toe spot. He added a stretcher piece to the contraption and it stretched that part of the shoe just perfect. He's super happy with his shoes now. I know we'll got a LOT of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: MorningGlory

customer_reviews.title: These stretchers work!
customer_reviews.text: I've been stretching my shoes with the old wooden stretchers for years, many times with no success. I bought these Miserwe stretchers on Amazon and used them on a pair of shoes I love, but were too short. I've tried several ways to stretch them before with no success. I dampened the toe area of the shoes then inserted the stretches and left them for 24 hours. The difference was very evident so I thought I'd push my luck and see if I could make them a bit longer. I repeated the process, let them sit another 24 hours and they are perfect! I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Low Bow

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a carry-on bag.
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Does the job!! I can now wear my Chuck Taylor's without killing my toes! I left it on for 2 days. Until I can finally feel no pain on any parts of my feet, I will keep stretching my shoes with these. One of the pegs that goes on the toe part broke already. :( I have to wait and see if it'll do it's job after 24hrs. Will update review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to use and worked great to give a little extra room in my Rocky S2V military boots. I wanted this particular pair of stretchers because I wanted to be able to do length and width but was worried they would not fit into boots. After doing some research I saw others using this type of stretcher in boots woth the sides folded down and they worked great and did exactly what I wanted them to do. The boot hight I have are 8.5 inches, and anything much higher and I do not think these would work because of the angle depending on how low you could fold the back of the boots down.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Novak

customer_reviews.title: Solid inexpensive shoe stretcher; bought to stretch Dansko clogs
customer_reviews.text: The shoe stretcher is pretty solid given that it’s made of plastic. I purchased them because I needed to stretch the top of a pair of Dansko clogs, and anyone who knows the shoe will know how “solid” and stiff the top is, and so far so good. It works ok, and I’m using it every evening after I’ve worn them and they are getting bigger, slowly but surely My one suggestion is to go slow and allow the leather to stretch slowly to avoid the stitching or leather ripping
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I used these on some authentic German leather shoes that match the leiderhosen I wear for Oktoberfest. These did a good job loosening up the shoes both in length and width. I'm not sure about durability. I nut came off the end of one of the metal rods that goes through the plastic shoe expander. I should be able to put it back in, but it'll be tight getting it between the two pieces. For the price I'd still say this is a good item.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Stop stepping out in agony. Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had large, wide feet which a decade of running around Manhattan in heels added bunions to, unfortunately. Finding cute, comfortable, affordable shoes is becoming more and more difficult. Thankfully, this shoe stretcher works perfectly to add just enough length and width that I don't have to mince through evenings out in stabbing pain counting the minutes until I can take my shoes off in the car on the way home. I should have invested the money years ago.
customer_reviews.author: AB Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these get the job done and give you options for stretching your shoes in various directions - including catering to bunions and specific tight spots. The instructions for what to do with all the extra parts and accessories they send with the stretchers are woefully inadequate. I never did figure out what to do with a couple of them. Maybe I will someday. I guess I flunked the “Are you smarter than a shoe stretcher?” quiz. But my shoes feel better!
customer_reviews.author: sunshan

customer_reviews.title: This gadget works!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought 3 pair of dress shoes for work and they were so tight I could not wear them so I searched the internet to find solutions to widening shoes which lead me to this item on Amazon. The key is leaving them in the shoe for 2 days. Worked on faux leather, suede and a pair of patten leather shoes. Best $20 spent on Amazon!! FYI: No spray required.
customer_reviews.author: IreneFL

customer_reviews.title: great, easy to use and able to lengthen as well as widen shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really love these stretchers - they will help stretch your shoes to a comfortable size without warping them (as long as you are patient and careful). The other extra benefit of this particular brand is that they come with the shown black knobs so that if you know your foot is wider at one particular area/region, then you insert the knobs when you stretch them and you end up with additional comfort. Lastly these shoe stretchers can help you with stretching your shoes in length or in width -- this is great particularly because sometimes ballet flats vary in length and not all manufacturers follow a standard length. Definitely wish I had gotten these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: M. Majoros

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these if you intend to use the bunion plugs
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and functional, these work well as general stretchers, however I don’t recommend them if you are using them to stretch because of bunions. The bunion plugs are extremely fragile. They literally break every time you use them. Each stretcher comes with 4 cheap plastic plugs and every one of them broke. I ordered metal ones to replace them and have tried super gluing the originals back together, but I haven’t tried them again. So, if you just need to stretch your shoes-these will do the job, but avoid them if you intend to use the bunion plugs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vermilyea

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great. I have several pairs of dress shoes I thought I was going to have to give up because my feet grew .5 a size, and now I will be able to keep them. So far I have stretched a pair of leather shoes and a pair of Asics, and it worked on both. I wasn't sure what to do with the larger black pieces at first, as the instructions weren't clear - after inserting the stretcher and turning the cranks, just slide the black piece on top, where the tongue of a shoe would be. That helps if a shoe is too tight across the top of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mellalune

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend - exercise in frustration
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to adjust the heel stretch component. I had to twist over 200 times to get the heel attachment into a taught position against the heel of the shoe to stretch it. If you are using the heel stretch component, you have to again turn the knob 200 times to get the stretcher out of the shoe so you can check on the progress. It is ridiculously frustrating. Pressure point pieces that attache to the forefoot e.g., little toe or bunion area kept falling off; three of pieces did not stay in while inserting into shoe.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my boyfriend’s shoes! He had a fit that none of them were wide enough & was about to throw out 5 pairs of shoes, including 3 Tom’s. Convinced him to wait 2 days until I could have this little device delivered and now he loves all of them. Will work with any type of shoe for width and/or length. One trick is if you don’t get enough stretch the first time, wet the shoes before you try again to minimize chance of ripping fabric. Also came with great storage bag and a bonus boot holder for me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Shanz610

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Used this three times. The first 2 times great, the third time horrible. It broke in my shoe. The handle came out of the shoe part and got stuck in my shoe. I had to pry it out.
customer_reviews.author: Samara

customer_reviews.title: WOW - just doubled my shoe wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Somewhere along the way after I had kids my feet went up between a 1/4 and 1/2 a size. My old shoes were often uncomfortable but the next 1/2 size up was sometimes right and sometimes too big. You can only wear so many mules and sandals, am I right? This works for my fabric and "man made" material shoes which can be tough. Love that I can add parts to target a particular area, and it comes with a carry bag. Took me a couple minutes to figure out how to use it so the directions could be enhanced. Everyone should own this, life is too short to wear uncomfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and then some!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Made to last, too. I earnestly believe that they'd be a bargain at 1/2 again or even twice the price! Throughout most of my adulthood, I was a perfect 11B, but in retirement, my feet began to flatten. Attendant tightness and discomfort were later augmented by a mild edema condition (swelling) precipitated by cardiovascular problems. This purchase has been a game-changer for me, as I've now restored every pair of shoes I own to service.
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Needs instructions
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these shoe stretchers to increase the height of the toe box on some of my shoes. It does come with a flat piece that I think should be used to do this, but I cannot figure out how to use it. The stretcher works fine to increase the other dimensions of shoes. The quality is good. I took off a star because I can't use it for the main purpose that I needed. I wish it came with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far, the device helps short term with suede shoes. I feel I need to stretch the shoes prior to each wear and that the result is not long lasting. Regarding the add-ons for pressure points -- some are hard to push in and then cannot fit in a more narrow shoe. The quality is OK but not great. However, the expander options are helpful in that you can easily stretch for length or/and width. Overall, the device is a good bet for your money and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Vespoint

customer_reviews.title: Good stretcher, works well in a variety of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have a very expensive metal boot stretcher, a wood shoe stretcher and these seem to do a better job all around. Wish I would have known before I tried the others. The key is the top arch piece that really helps with a high instep. I would recommend but please view the sizing chart, have to find another pair for bigger sizes. I have used these on some expensive boots and they have done the trick with the instep and width.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: Only used for a year and it's already gone bad
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 months of use i noticed it became harder and harder to turn the metal dials and get that really good stretch on your shoes. Now when turning it gets stuck all the time, and it's become useless. I can't get it past even a few turns. I thought it was well built and would last me a life time but it's already become garbage after barely a year of use. Very unhappy with it, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BC Singh

customer_reviews.title: ** UPDATED REVIEW ***
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - The seller sent me a new one which seems to be working much better! I change my review from 1 star to 4 stars! This thing is so crappy. There are nuts at the top, and if you turn to widen your shoes, the nut falls out! I tried dealing with it and just screwed the nut back in. After stretching my shoes for a few hours, I went to remove the stretchers, one came out, but the other would not, I literally had to yank it out. I tried disassembling it and putting it back together - no luck. It's really sad, I wanted to like this thing, but it has been such a hassle : (
customer_reviews.author: Russell M.

customer_reviews.title: Was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was debating these because they looked like cheap china made knockoffs. But i got them anyway. They are heavy duty. Well made. Work great. And are easy to use. Comes with attachments and a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: STop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: One of the best value items I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first but these legit work. Had 3 pairs of shoes and 2 pairs of boots that just hurt my feet as I got older. Stretched one pair of shoes longer and wider, stretched boots wider and roomier at top of my foot with the insert. I made 800 dollars worth of shoes wearable again for this 16 dollar plastic device. Couldn't be happier with such a low cost item. Would have paid 5x as much.
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was about to throw away 2 of my really good and pretty high end shoes since the fit was painful. I tend to go buy shoes that are on the tighter fitting since I am a sucker for loafers. Thought of giving this a try and OMG these are lifesavers (for my shoes :) ). Now I can wear those great shoes with my chinos and I think they pair off very nicely. Thank you!! and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend for heels, flats, even small boots!
customer_reviews.text: My right foot is wider than my left foot. Whenever I buy shoes I need to buy 8 Wide, but sometimes the wide size still hurt my right foot. I got these shoe stretchers to stretch my heels, flat shoes, and even a pair of rain boots. They have worked wonders! My feet don't hurt anymore. If you are confused, make sure you follow the instructions so that you are expanding your shoes the right direction. (you can't undo once you expanded them!)
customer_reviews.author: MLLB

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to use. I used this device with the shoe stretching spray to stretch a new pair of leather loafers that fit too snug. And it worked. I left the device in the shoes for 4 days. I adjusted the device after 2 days to stretch the shoes further. I’m glad I purchased this because now my shoes fit comfortably. Note: I got the women’s sizes 5.5 to 10 shoe stretcher. I wear 8.5-9 in women’s.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: best shoes stretcher!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this one before I gave up few pairs shoes. During pregnancy, my feet couldn't fit into few shoes. So i donated few pairs shoes and only kept my favorite pair which I love but never could wear more than half hour ( you know woman ....). I am glad I bought this shoe stretcher so I can wear my favorite flat comfortable and my husband won't complain I am spending money on the shoes which I never wear :D Update: I have been stretched my shoes with this product for 48 hours. It fits very comfortable! Love this shoes stretcher!
customer_reviews.author: Lily W.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and packaged well to keep use for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Had new running shoes that were tight on the top of my foot. Used this to stretch for 3 days. Easy and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Cintia

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: They came with a carry bag and metal shoe horn. Don’t know why it never occurred to me to use a shoe stretcher before. I’ve always just gotten rid of shoes that were too snug or pinched. How stupid is that. Can wear my new Prada pumps now comfortably. Had the stretcher on them for 48 hours, checking after 24 hr. Hard to tell left from right though because they weren’t labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These shoe stretchers are very user friendly! Turn the black dials to lengthen the shoe and turn the silver hooks to widen. I am in the process of trying to widen a pair of Converse. I'm not too sure it's going to work, and not b/c of the shoe stretchers..... b/c they're Converse. I'll post an update after trying them out on the Converse. I've had them in there for about 6 hours now and I do feel like there's a difference, but I'm going to leave them in for 24 hours and see how they feel after that.
customer_reviews.author: April W.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: They WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased expensive Tieks ballet flats, and the toe bed was so tight, my big toes really hurt! Rather than return them, I bought these stretchers. They can be used to stretch both the length and the width with great success, and it is very easy to adjust the gears. You can vary how much you stretch, by rotating the gears—a little or a lot. They are made of thick, high quality plastic. I am happy to report these worked brilliantly, and my shoes now fit well, and are comfortable. These shoe stretchers are absolutely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to stretch my wedding shoes which were a bit too snug, but an otherwise perfect fit. Super easy to use, and quick work. I didn't use any of the little black pieces that allow you to stretch specific areas of the shoe as it was just a tight toe box for me, but I love that feature and don't recall reading about it when I purchased. I'll update if I do use it. The hanger is also a nice bonus but it would be preferable if it had a hook. Nothing an old coat hanger can't fix though. We'll see how comfortable they are day of and I'll report back!
customer_reviews.author: Me!

customer_reviews.title: Miserwe Shoe Stretcher
customer_reviews.text: They worked very well. I am actually wearing the pair of shoes that I needed stretched. I had these shoes for at least 2 yrs. and I think I only wore them once or twice. Before the day or evening was over my feet hurt so bad I couldn't wait to get my shoes off. I am trying them now while I am in the house. So far so good. These shoe stretcher's work better than the spray shoe stretch that I purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: mommomdyer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5-9 in shoes and decided to keep a pair of too small, expensive size 8.5 shoes that I bought on E Bay. They were a rare color. Anyway, I would not advise buying a pair of shoes that cramp ones toes , but this stretcher increased the size of the shoes to a 9. They now fit. So, in a pinch you can count on these stretchers to make shoes wearable by 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Make your shoes comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoe stretchers because I ordered some new work shoes. The first pair I got were too big. The second pair (1/2 size smaller) were snug. I liked the shoes, but I didn’t want to work in snug shoes. So, these shoe stretchers were my solution. They allowed me to stretch my shoes until they were comfortable for me to wear. They saved my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great for widening shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughters lacrosse cleats, she wears a medium width shoe but the reinforced toe cap around the shoe was causing discomfort, not allowing her to fully spread out her toes when doing a hard jab step pivot or spin. After adding the extra bunion plugs and stretching for 72 hrs, adjusting pressure every 24 hrs, they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: My kids are ready

customer_reviews.title: Good Product just a little wonky at times
customer_reviews.text: It worked to stretch the shoes that I needed to stretch. However it does not work really well on pointy shoes as the front of the shoe is too wide to get into the point to stretch where your toes it. When I opened it and took it out of the box and also had this random bolts that fell off from in inside the shoe turning part but I was easily able to put it back on and I left my shoes in it for 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I can wear shoes that really fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return yet another pair of shoes that rubbed my toes too much for comfort, when I saw this. It took several days of increasing pressure, but the shoes are now wearable and very comfortable. If you have weird feet, with bits that aren't quite comfortable in most shoes, I highly recommend this tool. Have patience and keep at it and you'll have comfortable shoes like the rest of the world!
customer_reviews.author: martmann

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: These changed my life. I've had multiple surgeries on my right foot so my feet are different sizes now. (Thanks, post-surgical swelling!) I thought I'd never get to wear women's shoes ever again. The narrower toe boxes were hell on my Frankenfoot. Not anymore! After just 24-48 hours with the shoe stretcher, I have two different-sized shoes and happy feet! Goodbye old-man walking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: maggieb_06

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for me! I had surgery on my foot and it’s now a size bigger than my other one. These stretchers allowed me to keep most of my old shoes- I just stretched them. The quality is good- very sturdy. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that my set was missing one set of the bunion sets and black part for stretching the top of the shoe. So I can only stretch one at a time! I’ll be contacting the seller for another set.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lasure

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product! I purchased an expensive and fabulous pair ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I purchased an expensive and fabulous pair of pumps which felt snug and probably needed to be half a size larger. Unfortunately, there was no larger size in stock. I put these stretchers in, adjusted the wheel to the maximum I felt the shoes can withstand. In about 18 hours I took the stretchers out and the shoes felt great! Exactly the way I would want them to be. I am pretty sure anyone can at least stretch a pair to a one full size up. I will keep these for any other shoes I will purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Im am very surprised at positive reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe stretcher about 4 months ago since many of the reviews were positive. Previously I had a wooden one for many years and lost it when I moved, This stretcher does not stretch very well. It does not have the ability to stretch on the top of the shoe as my other one did. It is plastic and earlier today it broke apart. I am truly suspicious about all of the positive reviews. By any definition it is poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Use as directed and they work great
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions and use it with common sense and you will not have any issues. I tightened all the nuts before the first use so it didn’t fall apart. I expanded the width and length prior to putting in my shoes so I could see how much the device expanded with each turn. I didn’t over tightened but stretched my shoes slowly by a single turn every 12 hours. I warmed up my shoes prior to increasing the stretch. I stretched my shoes over a 4 day span. They worked perfectly every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed these very bad but I hesitated opening the package because I thought it may be complicated to use, that was no way the case with this product. Do you instructions were very simple and straightforward. I can’t believe I waited two days to use the stretcher, shame on me. This shoe stretcher seems to be of a very high-quality material, strong enough to stretch the shoes over a Mack truck.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jones A. Addict

customer_reviews.title: Broke...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the quality of these but one of them broke. I hadn't even been tightening it. I went to check on the boots and noticed that it was wobbly. It looks like the threading gave out. It hadn't even stretched the boot out as much as I needed it. So now I have to switch the working one over when its done and hope that it holds its shape.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Not all the plugs fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to stretch out specific areas on the sides of my shoes that pinched. I was disappointed that the included black plugs didn't fit the holes closest to the middle of the shoe stretcher. I contacted the seller about the problem and was told that I should try other plugs. Not the answer I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment!! My last pair of shoes shrank after my Tough Mudder event. They still looked new and I didn't want to donate them YET. I got these shoe stretching system and it works really really well. The instructions say that you need about 24 hours but that didn't work too well for me. I left them for a week, slowly increasing the width a day at a time. After that, they fit great. I didn't buy the shoe stretching spray. I was going to buy it if the shoe was still a little tight but it worked well by itself. I was able to use them in my 2017 TM last weekend.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Shoes to small? NO WORRIES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting these to work...especially because they are plastic. But I am a believer now!! I've had a pair of sneakers that I purchased YEARS AGO that ended up being too small by a country mile. Long story short I forgot to send them back and came across them while cleaning out the basement. For the price I couldn't not try these stretchers. Let me tell you something.....THEY WORK!!!! I was able to stretch the sneakers to where they fit PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Taz Kuzara

customer_reviews.title: Great value, well engineered and manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expecteted, easy to understand instructions. Just ensure you do any stretching a little at a time, giving each increment 24 hours. I successfully strecher 2 pairs of sneakers, one pair I accidentally purchased a woman's pair (too narrow), the other became to short with thick socks. Not sure that I'll ever need all the little inserts, but I have them, better than needing them and not having them. $20 for the pair, which made $240 of unusable running shoes, function as wished.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Allen

customer_reviews.title: Missing shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: My order did not come with a shoe horn, so I’m docking a point for that. But, I was able to use the stretcher to add some room in the front of my strappy sandals where the leather was a little tight. The shoe stretcher creaks a little when expanding so I don’t know how long this would last. I’m using this to stretch my soft leather shoes, so I don’t know how sturdy it is to stretch patent leather or thicker oxford leather shoes (I.e. dr martens). All-in-all, it’s an affordable way to add a little room to your shoes without having to go to the cobbler.
customer_reviews.author: Sulgi Cho

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I received mine yesterday and immediately put them in the shoes I wanted to stretch. I used a little rubbing alcohol on the inside of the area I was wanting to stretch and easily put the stretchers in place. I just took them off this morning and tried on the shoes and they are perfect! This was before the 24 hour suggested time on the stretcher, but I just wanted to check it and it works. Great solution without breaking the bank! I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LBJF

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the plastic construction not being durable but that was unwarranted. The metal is so soft in the central rod that the threads failed just while tightening (by hand) to put the “stretch” on a pair of shoes. So now they will only tighten to the point where the threads failed.
customer_reviews.author: G-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, right out of the box! They were easy to insert into my shoes and then the adjustable knob was easy to adjust the length of them to fit my shoes. Lastly the hook to twist to adjust the width (to stretch my shoes) was also easy to turn. I wanted cedar ones but I could only find them in men’s shoes sizes, but I am pleasantly happy with this purchase. They seem really sturdy and they work very well. Really great product for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool to stretch new shoes to a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought some hiking shoes and after a long hike I got blisters on my toes. I needed a better way to break these shoes in, so I did some research on google then I found them on Amazon, after reading all the reviews and doing some research of this product, I am excited to try this shoe strecher tool out, They made of good quality so I used them to stretch my new hiking shoes and a day later, I was able to put them on with a great fit! It really did stretch them to a comfortable level!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoe stretchers look even fancier in real life. Bought them for my grandmother who wears wide shoes and even then needs to often stretch them due to her delicate feet. It was really easy to put on the black things (for bunions and such). The yellow color makes it easy to spot them in the closet. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Chukhray

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one pair and a screw fell out. I talked with customer service and told them that I would fix the issue if they would send a new screw. The only thing they asked for was a picture of the issue and within 4 days of reporting the issue I had a new pair sitting on my front porch. Amazing customer service, and yes, the product works perfectly, as described. Great product and amazing customer service. Hard to believe, but true.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Baker

customer_reviews.title: So fun to use, complete score!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to expand some heavy leather Dansko clogs- this totally works!! Can store shoes w/them, & my big foot daughter can use the different “attachments “ for her shoes individually- as she tends to get cute over comfortable 🤣& sometimes her pinky toes get red or what not!!! Love the attachments 👍🏽Easy to use & kinda fun!!! Won’t work in boots, have to be shoes that aren’t beyond ankle high
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: These shoe stretchers do the job and are well built enough that they don't feel cheap or going to easily break. I used them to stretch out my leather cycling shoes as they tend to shrink up after getting wet after my rides. These do the job nicely. Only thing keeping me from giving 5 stars is that the plastic inserts are in locations that I don't need. It would be better if they had more holes and plastic pieces for say the top of the big toe instead of the side. At least that's where I could use more stretch room in my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Remains to be tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet been able to give a complete assessment of the product, but am hopeful that I will be pleased with it. The purpose is to make shoes more comfortable for wearing longer & more comfortably, which this is promising to do. I will definitely let you & others know if it works as promoted.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dianne

customer_reviews.title: On second use it came apart
customer_reviews.text: Try a different one. This stretcher looked like it would work. On my second pair it came apart. The part that spreads the toes stripped apart and doesn't look like it can be put back together. Will try to return it but box already thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Molyneux

customer_reviews.title: Great fix for tight shoes and works quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered these shoe stretchers. One pair of snug shoes fixed, two to go. I always get shoes that have a minor fit problem, and I usually don't realize it until I have worn them around for a while. I really love that I can keep my shoes and make them more comfortable to wear. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Spenser

customer_reviews.title: stretch your footwear easily to get a custom fit!
customer_reviews.text: My narrow Rockports finally fit!!!! What an amazing product. It's not only super simple to use but it comes with multiple explain adaptors so you can stretch exactly where you need to. You can customize the fit of your footwear as if custom made. The bag is also nice, very sturdy. I'm amazed at what I received for such a great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear safety shoes where I work and had bought 2 pairs. One was composite and the other Alloy. Both pinched me on the big toe. After using these stretchers I am able to wear both pairs now. By the end of the shift I feel the wear still on the toe but am able to deal with it. Good product
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: It is plastic not wood, neither or minus. The "instructions" are minimal and the font must be minus 2. They should have a link to a readable font, let's 10. I used my 10x lighted magnifier to read the so called instructions. The product is ok nothing special. A lot of parts and pieces
customer_reviews.author: Jay O.

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy and Functional Shoe Stretcher Set
customer_reviews.text: The shoe stretchers worked as advertised to widen a pair of tennis shoes in the area of the widest section of my feet. They seemed to be sturdy enough for the job. Indeed, because of the “spring back” of the shoes’ material (a combination of leather and synthetic woven material) I had to stretch the sides of the shoes, using the included black buttons, to the point where is was concerned that I might damage the shoes, but the set of stretchers held up to the strain without any problems. The included storage bag was also a nice inclusion for storing the shoe stretchers and their included smaller components.
customer_reviews.author: Zathras

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I work in the medical field and love wearing Dansko’s, however, they kill my feet when brand new before they stretch (I have wide duck feet with a high instep). So I decided to order this and try it out for my new Dansko’s instead of taking it to the shoe guy... and I am so impressed! Feels like they are broken in 😃 -stretched both the width and the height perfectly! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood78

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about this product as I read some reviews about the plastic easily breaking. I feel the product very sturdy! I’ve stretched 2 shoes so far with good success. My strategy was to stretch over 2 days...after the first day, I stretched another few turns and let the shoes sit another day. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: @amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: These shoe stretchers really work. I put them in a pair of shoes that were 1/2 to a full size too small and checked on the shoes the next day (24 hours later) and they fit perfectly. I honestly could not believe it. This works really well! It did not come with instructions, but it's fairly self explanatory. I took one star off for sturdiness because they are made of plastic and I'm not sure how well they are going to hold up, but all in all this seems like a great product. I already put them in another pair of shoes that need re-sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic device. I hesitated to buy one thinking that it would not work, however I have now been able to start wearing many of my shoes which I had put in the closet because they were too tight. The only problem is that the small plastic add on “bumps“ are fragile and two have broken already. I liked the device so much that I bought a smaller one for my wife’s shoes. I would highly recommend this item if you have a closet full of shoes that over the years have “shrunk”
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could use some fine tuning.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but could use some fine tuning. I still haven't figured out how to get the heel stretcher to stay in place, but that's not something I need. The more annoying thing is that the pressure point nubbins fall off really easily. They should be screw on rather than just pushing into a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Adultman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!!!!! This is a dream tool I can now wear my favorite shoes again! I bought the spray but didn't use it as I was in a hurry. I left the shoes in the stretcher for two full days and around 4 different pairs so far. I'm beyond happy with this amazing shoe stretcher.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money and time! I would have lost out on a really cute pair of shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product! I bought a pair of shoes that were in my regular size and they turned out to be about a half size too small. This stretcher allowed me to be able to reach the perfect size! I didn't have to worry about returns or possibly losing out on cute shoes! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Russell

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is a game-changer for my heels! What a wonderful pair of heels of course my left foot is bigger than my right foot it pinched and was so tight! 24 hours later after putting these in them they fit so comfortably so perfect ! They come with a cute bag and you can also hang them in your closet if you have narrow shoes and narrow feet might be a little bit difficult to get in but still worth the money
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: Helps to make my shoes more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of shoes last year but when I went to put them on this year I realize they were a little tight. These shoe stretchers have been working pretty good to increase the size. I need to do it one more time and they'll fit perfect. I've taken my time increasing the size slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jag

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and really works ! For canvas tennis shoes I washed the shoes first in cold water and put the stretcher in them wet as far as it would go for 2-3 days while they dried. Each day I tightened it a little more . It definitely increased the over all length size by one whole size and by width it made the shoes feel like a size wide , so it turned my size 10 canvas shes to a size 11 W
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality shoe stretch in the plastic variety. All the different pieces that you move to stretch different areas of your shoe fit snugly when applied and the crank mechanism turns smoothly. The best thing about this is the extra-long bonus shoehorn that comes with this product--I find myself using this every day!
customer_reviews.author: J. Woznicki

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok-ish
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 months of wetting shoe, turn two way stretcher, let dry, repeat all of the above weekly for three months before shoes finally stretched enough to fit comfortably. It works eventually... So there’s that, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first shoe stretcher that I have ever owned so I really wasn't sure what to expect. I used it on my Tieks which I bought in a size 6 but stretching the leather was too painful and I figured the size 7 would be too large (I am a true 6.5). They fit perfectly now! So glad because Tieks are not cheap and I want to get my money's worth! Happy customer. The instructions were also clear. Super easy to use. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay! It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every penny I paid. I am happy with the results. It can sometimes be a little finicky, but it’s not bad. I’m happy that it has made some unwearable shoes not only obtainable, but comfortable for this fat-footed gal. Where has this been my whole life?!?!
customer_reviews.author: ChristalynD

customer_reviews.title: A great FIT for any home that won’t STRETCH your wallet (lol I’m done)
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 10 and had acquired 2 pairs of canvas shoes that were about a half-size smaller than I would normally wear and these shoe stretchers worked perfectly. I’ve never used a set before but after a few minutes it all started to click. I left these in my shoes overnight twice and the shoes are a solid fit now. I would recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: brutedawg

customer_reviews.title: it works! saves my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions so i cannot wear shoes which are tight in the front. However, 3 of my favorite shoes, especially my favorite Timberland Boots are squeezing my toes and giving a hard time each time i wear them. I cannot throw them away though. Thanks to this shoe stretchers, my boots are SAVED! after a day, they are stretched out to give me a comfortable space inside. ;-) The whole set has Very good quality. I don;t need to worry too much about my shoes not fitting any more. It can stretch the length as well. I am glad i got this versatile tool!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Elsa

product_meta.title: Miserwe Shoe Stretcher with Carrying Bag Adjustable Unisex Shoes Stretcher
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :7.09 x 3.94 x 3.94 inches; 10.4 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :May 13, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Miserwe
 * ASIN :B0716V18SS

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #21,252 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #18 inShoe & Boot Trees 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars2,199 ratings
feature_bullets: 【MAKE SHOES PERFECT FIT】: This professional shoe stretcher solve shoes too small, squeeze feet, grinding feet and other issues,after use the shoe stretcher about 24 hours,your shoes will larger than before.

【FIT SHOES】Please Note:The shoe stretcher don't fit boots!!! Fit shoes: The professional shoe stretcher fit sandals,flats,casual shoes,canvas shoes,sports shoes,high heels (<6cm) and peep shoes, also Fits both left and right shoe.Best used for breaking in your new shoes or loosening up older shoes that are just too tight.

【TARGETED STRETCH】: 8 bunion plug and 2 Pad high plug in Each shoe stretchers for wide feet’ Package(included a carrying bag),inserts to stretch targeted areas known to relieve pain associated with blisters, corns or bunions.c
【DURABLE AND PERFECT DESIGN】: Made from tough polyurethane plastic and premium steel shaft,it has a long service time.The shoe stretcher shaped like a foot and can reach every where in your shoes.
【NOTE】Please choose the correct size shoe stretcher according the size of your shoes and read our description carefully.
